alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:46PM EDT until June 15 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crestview, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Westville, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Portland, Alpine Heights, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge and Center Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
